title: Lower Delaware National Wild and Scenic River: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar          Delaware River Sojourn Each June, the Delaware River Sojourn is a seven- to eight-day guided paddling trip in the upper, middle and lower sections of the river. The Sojourn combines camping, canoeing/kayaking and educational programs to participants who join the entire event or specific days of the event. This event is enjoyed by novice to experienced paddlers of all ages.
